### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE machine_performance_data ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  machine_id UUID, 
  performance_metrics JSONB, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP 
); 

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection_results ( 
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  anomaly_detection_details JSONB, 
  detected_timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE machine_performance_data SET performance_metrics = '{"cpu_usage": 80, "memory_usage": 60}' WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE machines_data (
    machine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL,
    disk_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE usage_stats (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    machine_id UUID,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL,
    disk_usage DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (timestamp, machine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE anomalies_detected (
    anomaly_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    machine_id UUID,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR,
    anomaly_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    anomaly_id UUID,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_resolution (
    resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    anomaly_id UUID,
    resolved_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_description TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE machines_data SET cpu_usage = 70.5 WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
